rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with a reception counter and seating area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern open living space with large windows to enhance natural light, oriented for optimal Vastu flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan dining area integrated within the living space for a unified aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen with an island, designed to face east as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located at the north end for positive energy flow, with ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with ample storage, positioned for privacy while maintaining natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for flexibility as a guest room or home office if needed.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated, quiet space with a north-east orientation to harness positive energy and focus.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the Master Bedroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small bathroom for guest convenience, positioned near Bedrooms 2 and 3.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area including laundry and storage space.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Modern entrance door with a security vestibule.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Access to two-car garage with automated door system.

openings.name: Front Windows
openings.description: Large windows for natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Patio Door
openings.description: Direct access to an outdoor patio area.
